# Initialization
```{r, message=FALSE}
library(rsurveyutils)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidylog)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```


# Preprocessing
## Functions
```{r}
recent_date_dir <- function(directory, recursive=FALSE){
  files <- list.files(directory, 
                      pattern="[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{1,2}-[0-9]{1,2}$",
                      include.dirs=TRUE,
                      recursive=recursive)
  files <- sort(as.Date(files), decreasing = TRUE)
  date_dir_path <- paste0(directory, "/", files[1])
  return(date_dir_path)
}
```


## Read data
```{r}
data_dir <- recent_date_dir(here("data/raw/emo_similarity_network_presurvey_sum2021"))
codebook_vars_filepath <- paste0(data_dir, 
                                 "/emo_similarity_network_presurvey_sum2021_var_codebook.csv")
codebook_values_filepath <- paste0(data_dir,
                                "/emo_similarity_network_presurvey_sum2021_value_codebook.csv")
codebook_vars <- read_csv(codebook_vars_filepath)
codebook_values <- read_csv(codebook_values_filepath)

filepath <- paste0(data_dir, "/emo_similarity_network_presurvey_sum2021.csv")
df_file <- read_csv(here(filepath))
df_raw <- df_file %>% 
  slice(-1:-2)  %>% 
  # -- remove columns with all NA -- #
  select_if(~!all(is.na(.))) %>% 
  # -- add raw data file name -- #
  mutate(rawdatafile = filepath) %>% 
  # -- rename columns -- #
  codebook_renamer(codebook_vars$qualtrics_var_name, codebook_vars$new_var_name)
```

## Process data

Note there is an error in the PAQ survey such that there is an extra pos column which I remove in the preproc pipeline.

```{r}
df_recoded <- df_raw %>% 
	# -- recode variables -- #
	codebook_recoder(var_regex=codebook_values$qualtrics_var_name, 
	                 values_from=codebook_values$src_value,
	                 values_to=codebook_values$dest_value) %>% 
  select(-paq_dif_pos_8)
df_proc <- df_recoded %>%
  mutate_at(vars(matches("^paq")), as.numeric) %>% 
  tally_scale("paq.*[0-9]$", "paq") %>% 
  tally_scale("paq_dif") %>% 
  tally_scale("paq_ddf") %>% 
  tally_scale("paq_eot") %>% 
  tally_scale("paq_.*_neg", "paq_neg") %>% 
  tally_scale("paq_.*_pos", "paq_pos") %>% 
  tally_scale("paq_dif_neg") %>% 
  tally_scale("paq_ddf_neg") %>% 
  tally_scale("paq_dif_pos") %>% 
  tally_scale("paq_ddf_pos") 
  
  
```
